main.title: Hi, I'm Carlos Galindo
main.subtitle: I'm a software developer
main.description: Jr. Full Stack Developer with experience in web development. I am passionate about technology and I am always looking to learn new things.

about.title: About me
about.description: I consider myself a person who is always looking to learn new things, I am a person who likes to work in a team and I am always looking to help others.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Some of the projects I have worked on

projects.name: CFE Workers Overtime Manager System
projects.description: Web application to manage and record the overtime of the workers of the CFE (Comisión Federal de Electricidad).

projects.name: UTMA Library Management System
projects.description: Web application to manage the library of the UTMA (Universidad Tecnológica Metropolitana de Aguascalientes).

projects.name: Microservices with Nodejs
projects.description: CRUD application with microservices architecture using Nodejs and express as backend, Next as frontend and PostgreSQL as database.

projects.name: Microservices with Docker
projects.description: CRUD application with microservices architecture using Docker, Nodejs and express as backend, Next as frontend and PostgreSQL as database.

projects.name: Atenea
projects.description: Uncentralized system for the management, follow-up and analysis of police reports. Developed for the Cybersecurity Hackathon by Fundación Dedica, ICP Hub Latam and Seguridad Pública de Aguascalientes.

projects.name: Talent Quest
projects.description: Platform of courses and certifications for the development of skills and competencies. Project developed for the Hackatón GDN-e 2025 by NTT Data.

projects.name: Yo Voy Ags App
projects.description: Mobile application for the management of public transport in Aguascalientes. Developed for the Hackathon Mobility 2025 by Coordinación General de Movilidad de Aguascalientes and Instituto de Educación de Aguascalientes (IEA).

projects.name: QuickView
projects.description: System for previewing DICOM images and sending results to patients by WhatsApp. System developed for the Hackathon by Genius Arena and Salud Digna (Hackaton Talent Lant 2025).

projects.name: Balluff Warehouse Orders Management System
projects.description: Desktop application for managing production line orders sent to the warehouse. The system records and maintains a history of all orders, enabling better traceability and inventory planning. It communicates with an industrial scale via a serial RS-232 connection to ensure accurate weight measurements and order control.

studies.name: Centro de Bachillerato Tecnológico Industrial y de Servicios No. 282
Universidad Tecnológica Metropolitana de Aguascalientes
studies.degree: Higher Technician in Information Technologies software development area

studies.name: Universidad Tecnológica Metropolitana de Aguascalientes
studies.degree: Engineering in Information Technologies software development area

workExperience.description: As an intern, I developed a worker management system for the Comisión Federal de Electricidad (CFE), based on a hierarchical role model: Capturist, Office Manager, Department Manager, and Superintendent. The system allowed users to register activities, which were automatically forwarded to the corresponding supervisor for review and validation, ensuring an efficient and controlled workflow.

As an intern, I participated in various tasks, including maintaining and extending the functionality of Balluff’s system, which monitors the PLCs on the production line (using Ignition Designer); optimizing and maintaining databases with historical records from the line's sensors; and developing a system to manage production line orders sent to the warehouse, using an industrial scale as a control mechanism.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You can send me an email or follow me on my social networks.

zurich.title: Deep Dive Into Blockchain 2025 by UZH.
zurich.description: I received one of the 10 scholarships offered by the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP), DFINITY Foundation and University of Zürich worldwide to participate in the three-week International Summer School program 'Deep Dive Into Blockchain 2025', organized by ICP and the University of Zürich, from June 30 to July 19, 2025, at UZH's central campus.

posts.title: These are some of the institutions and individuals who shared the notice.
